code: import React from'react';import{useSimulatorStore}from'../../store/simulatorStore';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ProgramCounter=()=>{const{cpu}=useSimulatorStore();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"cpu-component h-full flex flex-col items-center justify-center bg-cpu-blue bg-opacity-10",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"text-xs font-bold text-cpu-blue mb-1",children:"PC"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"text-sm font-mono bg-white px-2 py-1 rounded border","data-component":"pc-value",children:["0x",cpu.pc.toString(16).toUpperCase().padStart(8,'0')]})]});};export default ProgramCounter;
